name: Pony Chibi Girl Characters Dress Up: Kawaii Style
name_original: Pony Chibi Girl Characters Dress Up: Kawaii Style
description:
Rumor has it in Rainy city that the annual cute Chibi RockStar Princess Pony contest will be next week. You quickly check on the Internet only to see that this is indeed true. You have only seven days to match up against the city’s most fashionable Chibi RockStar Princess Pony!!!

Chibi RockStar Princess Pony Dress Up puts you in a situation where you can show your cute fashion and dress up your own unique and unbelievably cute Chibi RockStar Princess Pony. Only in this way you can achieve a version that is fitting for a winner in the city’s best Chibi RockStar Princess Pony contest.

Get your groove on and put that fashion taste and creativity into good use. Create the cutest little Chibi RockStar Princess Pony with the most outstanding and fashionable clothes and accessories.

------ How to Play ------


Chibi RockStar Princess Pony Dress up has a simple and fun gameplay. You can dress up your Chibi RockStar Princess Pony by customizing every piece of clothing and accessory. The game is rich on customization so you can achieve whatever fashion ideas you have in mind.

You can customise your Chibi Pony’s hair, head accessory, dress, necklace and environment.

The game is free to play. You can however pay a small fee to have specific Chibi RockStar Princess Pony models , as well as high class accessories or pieces of clothing unlocked.

What are you waiting for? Download Now!!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please rate this game and let us know what you think ! Your feedback is very important for me.
